testCase.name: Auth tests should register new user
Auth tests should not register new user without name
Auth tests should not register new user without email
Auth tests should login as user
Auth tests should give error with wrong token
Auth tests should give 404 status with wrong url
Auth tests should get a single user
Auth tests should update a single user
Auth tests should create new Forum
Auth tests should get a Forum
Auth tests should create new Post
Auth tests should get a Post
Auth tests should update a Post
Auth tests should get all history
